titleStmt.title: Viro, favore regio, et meritis suis honoratissimo, amplissimoque domino Edvardo Hide, equiti aurato, summo Angliæ & optato Oxoniæ cancellario, necnon serenissimo Regi Carolo II.do. à secretioribus conciliis &c. Carmen gratulatorium.
titleStmt.author: Whitehall, Robert, 1625-1685.

titleStmt.title: Viro, favore regio, et meritis suis honoratissimo, amplissimoque domino Edvardo Hide, equiti aurato, summo Angliæ & optato Oxoniæ cancellario, necnon serenissimo Regi Carolo II.do. à secretioribus conciliis &c. Carmen gratulatorium.
titleStmt.author: Whitehall, Robert, 1625-1685.

notesStmt.note: In Latin and English in facing columns.
Signed: Robert Whitehall, Fellow of Merton College.
Reproductions of the originals in the Bodleian Library (Early English books) and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
